documentation.text:
@title DragonBlock Smart Contract
 @dev A decentralized crowdfunding platform where users can create campaigns, donate, and vote using SuperSaiyan (SSJ) tokens.

@dev Private function to slash SSJ users' funds
 @param _campaignID The ID of the campaign

documentation.text: @dev Public function for users to exit the SuperSaiyan Set and become a normal user
@dev Public function for the contract creator to terminate the contract and withdraw funds

devdoc.details: A decentralized crowdfunding platform where users can create campaigns, donate, and vote using SuperSaiyan (SSJ) tokens.

becomeNormalUser().details: Public function for users to exit the SuperSaiyan Set and become a normal user

becomeSSJ().details: Public function for users to become part of the SuperSaiyan Set

createCampaign(uint256,uint16).details: Public function to create a new campaign

params._weekDuration: Duration of the campaign in weeks
params._weiLimit: Maximum amount of ETH that can be donated to the campaign

donateCampaign(uint256).details: Public function to donate to an active campaign

reportCampaign(uint256).details: Public function to report a campaign

revisionCampaign(uint256,bool).details: Public function for SSJ users to vote (approve or disapprove) a revisioned campaign

params._approval: Whether the user approves or disapproves the campaign

terminate().details: Public function for the contract creator to terminate the contract and withdraw funds

voteForCampaign(uint256,bool).details: Public function for SSJ users to vote (approve or disapprove) a pending campaign

params._approval: Whether the user approves or disapproves the campaign

devdoc.title: DragonBlock Smart Contract
